caption.p: Temporal structure of Bayesian hierarchical spatial temporal model for city-level SUHI intensity and D Multi-Group Dissimilarity Index as an explanatory variable. γt is the temporally structured effect modeled as a random walk of order 1 (RW1). Line of best fit is determined by ordinary least squares univariate linear regression. n = 3056. Gray lines are 95% credibility values. Dased line is the line of best fit derived from ordinary least squares linear regression.
